synopsis.text:
Mitsukuni Aoi's life takes a drastic turn when he discovers that his mother, Mito, is not just an ordinary mom but a notorious space pirate wanted in fifteen star systems for her crimes against the Galactic Empire. Standing at just three feet tall, Mito may appear childlike, but she possesses unparalleled courage and firepower that outshines even the brightest supernova. Despite her infamous reputation and the constant pursuit by the Galactic Patrol, Mito's deepest desire is to be called 'Mom' by her earthbound son.

As Aoi grapples with the revelation of his mother's true identity and her less-than-conventional appearance, he finds himself embarking on an extraordinary journey across the universe. Alongside Mito and her diverse crew of creatures and cyborgs, Aoi must navigate the complexities of his new family life, dodge the relentless Galactic Patrol operatives, and uncover the secrets of his mother and the cosmos. To make matters more complicated, Aoi finds himself falling for one of the Galactic Patrol operatives, adding a layer of romance to this thrilling adventure. Join Aoi and Mito, the first working mom to wield a pulse rifle, in this action-packed, heartwarming tale of family, love, and interstellar escapades.
